extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String card_desc
      String card_desc = holds the information of the card in text format
      java.lang.String card_name
      String card_name = holds the name of the card
      int[] card_stats
      int[] card_stats = holds the attack and defense values card_stats[0] = attack card_stats[1] = defense

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buffAttack(int att)
      buffAttack( number of attack gameEngine needs to buff ) Adds #att to the attack of the card
      void buffDefense(int def)
      buffDefense( number of defense gameEngine needs to buff ) Adds #def to the of the card
      void debuffAttack(int att)
      debuffAttack( number of attack gameEngine needs to debuff ) removes #att attack of the card

      debuffDefense( number of defense gameEngine needs to buff ) removes #def defense of the card
